ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.title: AP Shell
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.description:
Armor-Piercing shell
Effective against armored targets.

Explodes behind the armor.

Initial speed: 680 m/s
Penetration capacity: 12
Max durability: 7.6
Fuse sensitivity: 5

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.title: HE Shell
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.description:
High-Explosive shell
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit.

Initial speed: 460 m/s

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25802.title: Howitzer HE bullet
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25802.description:
High-Explosive bullet
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit.

cc19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111ccc25801.title: 152mm Sleeve
cc19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111ccc25801.description: Case for howitzer 152mm bullets. Gives the projectile an initial speed of 250 m/s

55a069ad-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b01.description: Press A or D to rotate your turret instead of using buttons or controllers
